column5: Getting this skeg welded is turning into a PITA  I have figuring it is better for my warranty, pocket book and time to put on a skeggard. Where can I buy a skeggard in Ontario?  forrest
Call: (613) 925-4015 or email them At [emailÂ protected] they should have them in stock
300K from my house.  DANG!  BUT they may be my ticket.  thanks Aile Goby! Man, that site hurt my eyes, they do look like THE place to go to for mods and other cool boat stuff.  forrest

I know it's a bit far but when it comes to water toys for big boys they have what your looking for. My dad deals with them every year or so. If i come accross another site or shop that is closer i'll post it up for you.
